pkgmetadata.longdescription: # lzallrightA Python 3.8+ binding for [LZðŸ‘Œ](https://github.com/jackoalan/lzokay) library which is> A minimal, C++14 implementation of the> [LZO compression format](http://www.oberhumer.com/opensource/lzo/).Licensed under the friendly MIT license.Wheels are built statically without any external dependencies.
